post.summary: CancelAction stops an Action.
GetAction gets an result of given Action.

output.description: Current Action output; may be partial if Action is still running.

pmmAgentId.description: pmm-agent ID where this Action is running / was run.

post.summary: AddAnnotation adds annotation.

schema.description: AddAnnotationRequest is a params to add new annotation.

post.summary:
AddExternal adds external service and adds external exporter.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds an "external exporter" agent to inventory, which is running on provided "runs_on_node_id".

addNode.description: AddNodeParams is a params to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

containerId.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

address.description:
Node and Exporter access address (DNS name or IP).
address always should be passed with add_node.

metricsMode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

metricsPath.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

nodeId.description:
Node identifier on which an external service is been running.
node_id always should be passed with runs_on_node_id.

nodeName.description:
Node name on which a service and node is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

password.description: HTTP basic auth password for collecting metrics.

runsOnNodeId.description:
Node identifier on which an external exporter is been running.
runs_on_node_id always should be passed with node_id.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

externalExporter.description: ExternalExporter runs on any Node type, including Remote Node.

disabled.description: If disabled, metrics from this exporter will not be collected.

metricsPath.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

pushMetricsEnabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

runsOnNodeId.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

service.description: ExternalService represents a generic External service instance.

nodeId.description: Node identifier where this service instance runs.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

service.description: HAProxyService represents a generic HAProxy service instance.

nodeId.description: Node identifier where this service instance runs.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

post.summary:
AddMongoDB adds MongoDB Service and starts several Agents.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "mongodb_exporter", and "qan_mongodb_profiler" agents
with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

addNode.description: AddNodeParams is a params to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

containerId.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

collectionsLimit.title:
Collections limit. Only get Databases and collection stats if the total number of collections in the server
is less than this value. 0: no limit

disableCollectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

metricsMode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

nodeId.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

nodeName.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

password.description: MongoDB password for exporter and QAN agent access.

pmmAgentId.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

qanMongodbProfiler.description: If true, adds qan-mongodb-profiler-agent for provided service.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

statsCollections.description: List of collections to get stats from. Can use * .

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MongoDB username for exporter and QAN agent access.

mongodbExporter.description: MongoDBExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes MongoDB Service metrics.

collectionsLimit.title:
Collections limit. Only get Databases and collection stats if the total number of collections in the server
is less than this value. 0: no limit

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

pushMetricsEnabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

statsCollections.title: List of colletions to get stats from. Can use *

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MongoDB username for scraping metrics.

qanMongodbProfiler.description: QANMongoDBProfilerAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends MongoDB Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MongoDB username for getting profiler data.

service.description: MongoDBService represents a generic MongoDB instance.

address.description:
Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

nodeId.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

post.summary:
AddMySQL adds MySQL Service and starts several Agents.
It automatically adds a service to inventory, which is running on provided "node_id",
then adds "mysqld_exporter", and "qan_mysql_perfschema" agents
with provided "pmm_agent_id" and other parameters.

addNode.description: AddNodeParams is a params to add new node to inventory while adding new service.

containerId.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

address.description:
Node and Service access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

disableCollectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

maxSlowlogFileSize.description:
If qan-mysql-slowlog-agent is added, slowlog file is rotated at this size if > 0.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable rotation.

metricsMode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

nodeId.description:
Node identifier on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

nodeName.description:
Node name on which a service is been running.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: node_id, node_name, add_node.

pmmAgentId.description: The "pmm-agent" identifier which should run agents. Required.

port.description:
Service Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

qanMysqlPerfschema.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-perfschema-agent for provided service.

qanMysqlSlowlog.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-slowlog-agent for provided service.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Required.

socket.description:
Service Access socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

tablestatsGroupTableLimit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

mysqldExporter.description: MySQLdExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes MySQL Service metrics.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

pushMetricsEnabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tablestatsGroupDisabled.description: True if tablestats group collectors are currently disabled.

tablestatsGroupTableLimit.description:
Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MySQL username for scraping metrics.

qanMysqlPerfschema.description: QANMySQLPerfSchemaAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends MySQL Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

queryExamplesDisabled.description: True if query examples are disabled.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

Address (and port) or socket is required.

nodeId.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

tableCount.description: Actual table count at the moment of adding.

post.summary: RegisterNode registers a new Node and pmm-agent.

containerId.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

disableCollectors.description: List of collector names to disable in this exporter.

metricsMode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

reregister.description: If true, and Node with that name already exist, it will be removed with all dependent Services and Agents.

containerId.description: Container identifier. If specified, must be a unique Docker container identifier.

machineId.description: Linux machine-id of the Generic Node where this Container Node runs.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name.

genericNode.description: GenericNode represents a bare metal server or virtual machine.

pmmAgent.description: PMMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node.

connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

runsOnNodeId.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

customLabels.description: Custom user-assigned labels for Node and Service.

engine.description: DiscoverRDSEngine describes supported RDS instance engines.

metricsMode.description:
MetricsMode defines desired metrics mode for agent,
it can be pull, push or auto mode chosen by server.

nodeName.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name. Defaults to AWS instance ID.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Defaults to AWS instance ID.

tablestatsGroupTableLimit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.

 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.

tablestatsGroupDisabled.description: True if tablestats group collectors are currently disabled.

Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

postgresqlExporter.description: PostgresExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes PostgreSQL Service metrics.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

pushMetricsEnabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation. Uses sslmode=required instead of verify-full.

username.description: PostgreSQL username for scraping metrics.

qanMysqlPerfschema.description: QANMySQLPerfSchemaAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends MySQL Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

queryExamplesDisabled.description: True if query examples are disabled.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: MySQL username for getting performance data.

qanPostgresqlPgstatements.description: QANPostgreSQLPgStatementsAgent runs within pmm-agent and sends PostgreSQL Query Analytics data to the PMM Server.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tlsSkipVerify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: PostgreSQL username for getting pg stat statements data.

rdsExporter.description: RDSExporter runs on Generic or Container Node and exposes RemoteRDS Node metrics.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

listenPort.description: Listen port for scraping metrics (the same for several configurations).

pmmAgentId.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

pushMetricsEnabled.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - DONE: Agent finished.
 - UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

tableCount.description: Actual table count at the moment of adding.

post.summary: DiscoverRDS discovers RDS instances.

items.description: DiscoverRDSInstance models an unique RDS instance for the list of instances returned by Discovery.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

engine.description: DiscoverRDSEngine describes supported RDS instance engines.

post.summary: ChangeSecurityChecks enables/disables Security Thread Tool checks or changes their interval by names.

items.description: ChangeSecurityCheckParams specifies a single check parameters.

interval.description: SecurityCheckInterval represents possible execution interval values for checks.

name.description: The name of the check to change.

post.summary: GetSecurityCheckResults returns Security Thread Tool's latest checks results.

items.description: SecurityCheckResult represents the check result returned from pmm-managed after running the check.

readMoreUrl.description: URL containing information on how to resolve an issue detected by an STT check.

serviceName.description: Name of the monitored service on which the check ran.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

post.summary: ListSecurityChecks returns a list of available Security Thread Tool checks.

items.description: SecurityCheck contains check name and status.

disabled.description: True if that check is disabled.

interval.description: SecurityCheckInterval represents possible execution interval values for checks.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

post.description: All the available checks will be started if check names aren't specified.
post.summary: StartSecurityChecks executes Security Thread Tool checks and returns when all checks are executed.

names.description: Names of the checks that should be started.

post.summary: RemoveService removes Service with Agents.

serviceId.description:
Service ID or Service Name is required.
Unique randomly generated instance identifier.

serviceName.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name.
